about.details:
Maruti Interior Products Limited is engaged in manufacturing and domestic sale & export of modular kitchen storage system, aluminium long wardrobe handle & profile handle. The company has a wide range of product offerings for different customer segments. The brand Everyday Kitchen is focused on the economic range of products, while the other brand Spitze by Everyday offers premium products. Apart from the company's own branded products, it also manufactures products for big companies like Godrej, Hafele India, Kaff Appliances, Walmart, Homelane, Livespace, Spacewood, etc.

All products manufactured by MIPL are designed in-house and the company has marketing and distribution network across India. MPIL has an online presence selling direct to customers via online, e-commerce platforms like Amazon and Flipkart. With an eye on the direct customers, the company has also developed Do it yourself (DIY) products.

MIPL's factory is spread across approx. 1,00,000 sq. ft in Gujarat. The company has 300+ dealers and 25+ distributors PAN India. It also has distributors in Uganda. The company is also in process of tying up for oven wire shelf with one company in Austria.

Competitive Strengths:

  • High quality and varied manufacturing capability
  • Experienced & skilled marketing team
  • Online marketing and sales of products
  • Prestigious awards and recognition
  • Ambitious expansion plans
  • Experienced promoters and a well-trained employee base

faqs.question: What is the Maruti Interior IPO?
faqs.answer:
Maruti Interior IPO is a SME IPO of 2000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹55 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on February 3, 2022, and closes on February 8, 2022.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Maruti Interior IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Maruti Interior IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Maruti Interior IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Maruti Interior IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Maruti Interior IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Maruti Interior IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Maruti Interior IPO opens on February 3, 2022 and closes on February 8, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Maruti Interior IPO?
faqs.answer: Maruti Interior IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,10,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Maruti Interior IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Maruti Interior IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Maruti Interior IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Maruti Interior IPO will be done on Friday, February 11, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, February 15, 2022. Check the Maruti Interior IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Maruti Interior IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Maruti Interior IPO listing date is on Wednesday, February 16, 2022.
